ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.title: I - Getting Started[--I - 入门--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.subtit: It's got Electrolytes![--它富含电解剂!--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quests: Log(Tree)[--原木(树)--]
Growing on you[--长在你身上--]
&bGrow the Sapling&r you spawned with, and chop it down.[--&b种出你出生带的树苗&r,然后砍下来.--]
Leaves can be run through a &6Sifter&r to give a higher chance per block of obtaining saplings.[--树叶可以用&6筛子&r筛,有更高的几率获得树苗.--]
They also make a great source of Compost or Apples with better meshes. It's worth investing in some &6Flint Shears&r when possible.[--它们也可以作为堆肥或者用更好的筛网筛出苹果。可以的话做出一些&6燧石剪刀&r是很不错的。--]
Logs[--原木--]
Sifter go Brrr[--筛子转起来--]
Sifting for treasures[--筛中寻宝--]
&bSifters&r will allow you to run materials such as Gravel, Sand, and Dust through &6Meshes&r to find materials.[--在&b筛子&r上用&6筛网&r筛砂砾、沙子和尘土等获得材料.--]
A &bHand Crank&r produces enough &6stress capacity&r for 8 Sifters! Sifters also have a Cog in them, so you can place them in a line.[--&b手摇曲柄&r可以为8个筛子产生足够的&6动力&r!筛子也有齿轮,所以你可以把它们放在一条线上.--]

Make sure the cogwheel that is part of the sifter aligns with the cogwheel your handcrank is on. You'll also need to make sure you've placed the mesh in the sifter. The material to sift should be thrown or hoppered into the top, not placed as a block.[--确保筛子上的齿轮与齿轮对齐。你还需要注意将筛网放在筛子里。筛子的材料应该扔进或漏进顶部,而不是放置为方块。--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

You'll want to &lprioritize getting food&r as the hand crank can consume quite a bit of hunger! We've given you some but you should setup an auto fisher and work towards a wheat farm once you get some &bPasture Seeds&r to make grass. [--你可能想要点&l先来点吃的&r,因为手摇曲柄会消耗大量饱食度!我们会给你一些,但当你得到&b草籽&r得到草方块时,你应该搞一个自动钓鱼机和小麦农场。--]

Once you get wheat you can create &bChickenpalooza Gates&r for lots of chicken. Lastly, there should be an easter egg hidden somewhere on your island as well which may provide some assistance...[--你得到小麦后,就可以给鸡造一个&b小鸡农场&r了。最后,在你的岛上某个地方应该藏着一个彩蛋,也可以提供一些帮助......--]
Cobbled together[--圆石碎块--]
These rock[--这些石子--]

&6Sneak right-click Grass, Dirt or Compact Machine Walls&r to collect &bRocks&r. These can be crafted into Cobblestone. You'll also find &bSoil&r which can be combined to make dirt in the same way. Combine both of them for &bGravel&r. [--&6潜行右键草方块、泥土或压缩空间壁&r来收集&b石子&r.石子可以合成圆石.你还可以找到&b土块&r,它们同样可以合成泥土.它们还能一起合成&b沙砾&r.--]
Holding soil or cobble clumps in your offhand will let you target what you're digging to be more selective.[--在副手拿着土块或石子就可以选择性生产你想要的东西。--]
Once you make your first sifter look towards automating cobble and dirt with a cobble generator from the &eCobble for Days&r mod. [--你做出你的第一个筛子后就可以做&eCobble for Days&r模组的圆石制造机自动化圆石和泥土了.--]
This is Not a Drill[--这不是钻头--]
Hammer Time![--锤子时间!--]
&bHammers&r can crush blocks into finer blocks.[--&b锤子&r可以将方块粉碎成更细的方块.--]
See the Hammer's uses in JEI (using the U key) to see what blocks smash into what.[--在JEI中查看锤子的用途(使用U键),什么方块粉碎成什么.--]
While holding the Hammer and looking at a smashable block, it will show you what it smashes into.[--拿着锤子看一个可粉碎的方块时,它会告诉你粉碎的产物.--]
There are also automatic versions you can craft once you have the materials.[--有了材料后,你也可以制作自动化版本。--]
Hammers[--锤子--]
Stringing you along[--与你共舞--]
Flax on, flax off[--亚麻起,亚麻倒--]
&bString&r can be either &6harvested from Flax&r, or found on your island. Bonemeal will allow the flax to grow much faster.[--&b线&r可以&6从亚麻&r中收获,也可以在你的岛上找到.骨粉可以让亚麻生长得更快.--]
Stringing you along[--与你共舞--]
The &bString Mesh&r isn't very sturdy or finely woven. It'll get &6the most basic resources&r, but not much else.[--&b线筛网&r非常不坚韧精细。可以得到&6最基本的资源&r,但不会有太多其他的副产物.--]
Gravel Alloys[--砂砾合金--]
Nuggets of wisdom here[--这里的智慧之粒--]
Sifting Gravel will net you &bIron Shards&r. These can be crafted into &6Andesite Alloy&r, which is necessary for progression.[--筛沙砾会得到&b铁碎片&r.这些可以合成&6安山合金&r,是进度所必需的.--]
Rolling on the River[--随水流转动--]
Water you doing step wheel[--为你的轮子浇水--]
The Hand Crank quickly consumes hunger, and it's not very engaging either! Let's move on to something more efficient.[--手柄曲柄会快速消耗饱食度,而且一点也不好玩!让我们继续做更高效的东西吧。--]
&bWater Wheels&r produce rotational force from flowing water. Eventually you'll be able to make better sources, but that's later.[--&b水车&r从流动的水中产生动力。最后,你可以做更好的动力源,但这是以后的事了。--]

TIP: These waterwheels break over time. You can see the durability with engineer's goggles and they can be repaired by right clicking them with andesite alloys.[--TIP:这些水车随时间损耗。你可以通过工程师护目镜看到耐久度,用安山合金右键单击它们可以修复.--]
Material Generator[--材料生成器--]
Material 'N You[--材料和你--]
With access to Lava, you can now craft and install a &bMaterial Generator&r onto a &bPedestal&r.[--有了熔岩,你现在可以合成&b材料生成器&r并安装在&b基座&r上.--]

[\"\",\"For furthur documentation on Pedestals, \",{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"23D7D83EBA8C36CE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Pedestals chapter\"]}},\" to see its quests.\"][--[\"\",\"想要更多关于基座的文档, \",{\"text\":\"点这里\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"23D7D83EBA8C36CE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Pedestals chapter\"]}},\"查看它的任务吧.\"]--]
The most immediate use will be placing a stone block under the material generator to provide an unlimited source of cobble for you to sift for resources.[--最直接的用途是在材料发电机下放置一个石头,为你的筛子提供无限的圆石。--]

Hint: Make sure you have the upgrade in your OFF hand before right-clicking to insert it into the pedestal. Otherwise, you will only put the upgrade on display.[--提示:在右键单击将其插入基座之前,确保升级放在副手。否则,你只是把升级组件放在了展示台上。--]
Dragon Glass[--龙之玻璃--]
Obsidian Dreams[--黑石之梦--]
Now that you have a source of Lava, you can pour Water over it to get &bObsidian&r![--现在你有了熔岩源,你可以在上面倒水来得到&b黑石&r!--]
At this point you should should be able to craft soul steel for a pickaxe that is capable of mining it.[--在目前阶段,你应该可以制作灵钢来得到一个能够开采它的镐子。--]

[\"当你做到了\", {\"text\":\"植物魔法\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"4FA6ADCA7857A92F\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Botania Chapter\"]}},\" 你也可以用你多余的烈焰粉做成烈焰网并用白雏菊转化成黑曜石.\"]
Dust to Dust[--尘到尘--]
That's just fine![--这很好!--]
&bGravel&r, &bSand&r, and &bDust&r are the three primary blocks you can sift for materials.[--&b沙砾&r,&b沙子&r,和&b尘土&r是筛子所需的三个主要方块.--]
Twisting turning through the nether[--在下界扭曲缠怨--]
Going deeper...[--更深...--]

&bThe Nether&r in &dFTB Skies&r is a void as well. Of course, some mobs can only spawn there, so it's &6worth building a mob farm&r there to obtain rare resources.[--&b下界&r在&dFTB Skies&r中也是一片虚空。当然,一些生物只能在那里生成,所以那里可以&6有富裕的条件建造一个生物农场&r来获得稀有资源.--]
Once you have flight, you'll be able to explore for &6floating Nether Villages&r.[--一旦你有了飞行,你就可以探索&6悬空的下界村庄&r.--]
Power dust![--能量粉末!--]

Redstone is your gateway into energy production and management. After you get some, look into some of the power generation mods like cyclic, thermal expansion and mekanism.[--红石是你通往能源生产与自动化管理的大门门。在得到它们后，请查看一些发电模组,比如循环、热力膨胀和通用机械。--]
Dirt[--泥土--]
Toil Soil[--为土奋斗--]

For now you can combine soil into dirt but eventually, you'll need a better method. Placing &bCompost&r or &bRich Soil&r under a &6Material Generator&r slowly yields an infinite supply of Dirt, useful for sifting or growing.[--现在,你可以用土块合成泥土,但最后你需要更好的方法。将&b堆肥&r或&b沃土&r放置在&6材料生成器&r下,可以缓慢产生无限的泥土,用于筛造或生长.--]
Dirt-making blocks[--泥土制造方块--]
Oh Beehave![--哦，有密蜂!--]
No come back![--没有回来!--]
You may occasionally run into a &bLoot Bee&r that spawns around your island. They'll &6give you gifts&r if you stay nearby![--你偶尔会遇到一个在你的岛屿周围生成的&b战利品蜜蜂&r。如果你在附近,它们会&6送你礼物&r!--]

However, they may fly off and bee lost forever. You can use a &6Lead&r to keep them in place, but they'll also follow you if you hold a &6Poppy&r.[--然而,它们可能会飞走,永远消失。你可以用&6栓绳&r原地栓住它们,但如果你拿着&6花花&r,它们也会跟随你.--]
Once they've shed their beeautiful delights you can keep them around for breeding bees and making honey![--一旦蜜蜂放下警惕了,你就可以留下它们来繁殖蜜蜂和制作蜂蜜了!--]
Follow the nether brick road[--跟随下界砖路--]

You can get &bNether Bricks&r by &6tossing Bricks into &eOccultism&r's Spiritfire&r. That can be placed under the Material Generator for a &6limitless source of Netherrack&r![--你可以通过&6将砖块扔进&e神秘学&r的灵火&r来得到&b下界砖&r.这可以放置在材料生成器下以获得&6无限下界岩&r!--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"Click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"476DF733E6E2DA51\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Occultism chapter\"]}},\" to see Occultism's quest line for more details.\"][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"点这里\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"476DF733E6E2DA51\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Occultism chapter\"]}},\"查看神秘学的任务获得更多细节.\"]--]
Not a Trampoline[--别当蹦床使--]
I loved their Blue Album[--我喜欢他们的蓝色--]

The &bSqueezer&r squeezes fluids out of items and/or crushes them for processing. To do so, place an item inside and then &6repeatedly jump on it&r until it's done.[--&b挤压机&r从物品中挤出流体或粉碎以进行处理。将物品放入里面,然后&6在上面跳&r直到压到底.--]

Resulting fluids and items are pushed into a tank or inventory on either channeled side of the Squeezer. If it isn't emptied, you can't squeeze another item. &6Reset the Squeezer with a redstone signal.&r[--输出的流体和物品会被推入挤压机带通道一面的储罐或容器中。如果挤压机没空的,就不能挤压另一个物品。&6用红石信号重置挤压机.&r--]
Notably, there are tales of people &6using armor stands to avoid manual labor...&r[--值得注意的,是流传着有人&6使用盔甲架来进行自动工作...&r的传说--]
Balanced Sifting[--平衡筛子--]
Under da sea![--在大海下!--]
Sifters that are &6waterlogged&r sometimes produce alternative resources.[--&6含水筛子&r有几率产生其他资源.--]
Hint: To waterlog a sifter without a bucket, you must place it into a block of water.[--提示:在没有桶的情况下让筛子含水,你必须将它放在水里。--]
Not this again...[--别又这样了...--]
At least it's not lava.[--至少它不是熔岩。--]
Fishing can &onet&r you &6all kinds of treasures&r, from food to Enchanted Books.[--钓鱼可以&o得到&r你&6许多种类的宝藏&r,从食物到附魔书.--]
Casting a reel into water over and over may be relaxing to some, but pure torture to others.[--把鱼勾扔进水里,可能会让某些人放松,但对于其他人就是纯纯的折磨。--]

To help you on your journey, we've included the handy-dandy &eCyclic&r &bFishing Net&r! Just insert your Fishing Rod, and it'll handle the rest.[--为了在你的旅途中帮你一把,我们为你准备了&e循环&r的便利&b自动鱼栅&r!只需放入你的钓鱼竿,剩下的交给它就好了.--]

The only problem is that &cit spits the loot over the entire water surface&r, rather than collecting it in an inventory. An &6Item Collector&r would be very helpful.[--唯一的问题是&c战利品会在水面上吐的到处都是&r,不会自动放入物品栏中.&6物品收集器&r会很有帮助.--]
Fishing is also a good source of &bInk Sacks&r and &bCoral&r[--钓鱼也是&b墨囊&r和&b珊瑚&r的好来源--]
A seedy place[--一个茂密的地方--]
Ex Terra [--来自陆地--]
Sifting Dirt has a chance of producing &bPasture Seeds&r, which can &6turn Dirt into Grass&r.[--筛泥土有几率产生&b草方种子&r,可以&6将泥土变成草&r.--]
Using Bone Meal on Grass can grow a variety of &6flowers, seeds, and roots&r.[--在草方块上使用骨粉可以种植各种&6花、种子和根&r.--]

Wandering traders can sell GMO chicken feed which you can feed to chickens to get a golden egg to make &6Delightful Dirt&r, which makes passive mobs spawn MUCH faster.[--流浪商人可以出售转基因鸡饲料,您可以给鸡喂食,获得一个金蛋来制作&6祈福之土&r,这样被动生物的生成速度就会更快.--]
Moulding your future[--铸造你的未来--]
Various &6Spores&r may be obtained from Sifting.[--可以通过筛子获取各种&6孢子&r.--]
Sifting Dirt may yield &bMycelium Spores&r which, when used on Dirt, convert it into Mycelium.[--筛泥土可以产生&b菌丝孢子&r,在泥土上使用时,它们会转化为菌丝.--]
Various other Spores can be obtained from &6Crushed Netherrack&r, once you're able to supply it.[--你能用&6粉碎下界岩&r获取各种其他孢子.--]
Events[--事件--]
Fun little things that can happen[--有趣的小事可以发生--]
The pack uses a system called &eEvents&r, where things can randomly happen sometimes. All events are enabled by default.[--整合包使用一个叫做&e事件&r的系统,有几率随机发生。默认情况下所有事件都被启用.--]
You can toggle them with the &b/events toggle&r command. Typing that will also show you a list of each.[--你可以用&b/events toggle&r指令来切换它们。打字时也会显示每个命令的列表.--]

The events with a mob in the name (&6ftbskies:frog&r, &6:animal&r, &6:wandering_trader&r etc) just cause that mob to spawn occasionally.[--以&6ftbskies:frog&r、&6:animal&r、&6:wandering_trader&r等命名的怪物事件只是偶尔生成该生物.--]
Some, like &6:tea&r and &6:stick&r are just fun little nonsense events, which are inconsequential.[--有一些指令,比如&6:tea&r和&6:stick&r只是一些有趣的小胡闹事件,这些是无序的.--]

[\"\",\"Some, like \",{\"text\":\"ftbskies:amethyst\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"5DF3A9F48D916AF0\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Budding Amethyst quest\"]}},\" are integral to progression, so beware.\"][--[\"\",\"一些指令，像\",{\"text\":\"ftbskies:amethyst\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"5DF3A9F48D916AF0\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Budding Amethyst quest\"]}},\"是进程的一部分,所以要小心.\"]--]
Andestined for greatness[--伟大安山--]
With the improved &bAndesite Mesh&r, you're able to collect &6more varied resources&r from the Sifter.[--随着&b安山合金筛网&r的改进,你可以从筛子中收集&6更多不同的资源&r.--]
I'm twerked about Twerk.[--一想到要做电臀舞我的屁股就开始扭起来了--]
Squat no grow :([--蹲起不能催熟:(--]
Dancing around your trees &cdoesn't seem to encourage growth&r, contrary to all standard botanical knowledge.[--在你的树周围跳舞&c似乎不会帮助生长&r,这与所有标准mc植物学知识相违背.--]
Luckily, there are plentiful sources of &6Bone Meal&r! Either make some in a &bComposter&r, or sift it from Dust.[--幸运的是,有大量的&6骨粉&r来源!或者用&b堆肥桶&r做一些,或者从尘土中筛出来.--]
Get Sugar Cane[--得到甘蔗--]
&bSugar Cane&r is used in several important early recipes. If your island doesn't spawn with any, you can &6Sift&r some![--&b甘蔗&r用于几个重要的早期配方。如果你的岛屿没有生成,你可以&6筛&r一些!--]
Thanks to &eApotheosis&r, Sugar Cane can grow to new heights![--多亏&e神化&r,甘蔗可以长到新的高度!--]
Liquid Fire[--流动的烈焰--]

Getting Lava by hopping on a Squeezer is &ca bit time consuming&r. Once you've gotten a source of power, look into the &6Mechanical Squeezer&r or the &6Magma Crucible&r.[--在挤压机上跳获得熔岩会&c很耗时间&r.当你获得能源时,请查看&6自动挤压机&r或&6熔岩炉&r.--]

If you wish to proceed with getting lava in the Mixing Cauldron, you will need 2 buckets of blood, so that the conversion of the first bucket of blood with the 8 stone, produces 1 rock, the second bucket is then converted to Lava.[--如果你想在混合锅中获取熔岩,你需要两桶血液,这样,用8个石头转换第一个血液桶,产生1个石子,然后第二个桶变成熔岩。--]
Alternatively, you could &6automate Dripstone&r! If it's hanging from a block that has Lava above, it'll &6fill the Cauldron below&r![--或者,你可以&6自动化滴水石&r!滴水石挂在上方有熔岩的方块上,会慢慢&6填满下方的炼药锅&r!--]
Starting Your Island[--创建你的岛屿--]
How to start[--如何开始--]
Going through the ship's portal will allow you to &6choose a starting island&r, create an &eFTB Teams&r party, and send you there.[--穿过船上的传送门可以让你&6选择一个开始的岛屿&r,创建一个&eFTB团队&r,然后把你送到那里.--]

If you wish to &6play with a friend&r, &6join their party&r! Ask them to invite you to their party, or invite them to yours! (the button is at the top right of the &6My Teams&r menu in the inventory).[--如果你想&6和朋友玩&r,&6加入他们的队伍&r!请他们邀请你加入他们的队伍,或邀请他们加入你的队伍!(按钮位于物品栏中的&6团队&r菜单的右上角)--]
You can teleport back to your party's island using the &6/ftbdim home&r command, and visit others with &6/tpa&r.[--你可以使用&6/ftbdim home&r指令将你传送回你的队伍的岛屿,然后用&6/tpa&r拜访其他人.--]
The &bAnnotated Codex&r will allow you to share any glyphs you've learned in Ars Nouveau with your friends.[--&b注解手抄本&r允许你与朋友分享你在新生魔艺中学习的魔符。--]
Less to render means less to lag![--减少渲染意味着减少延迟!--]
&dFTB Skies&r comes with &eOculus&r, a mod which allows you to use &6shaders&r![--&dFTB Skies&r包含&eOculus&r,一个允许你使用&6光影影&r的模组!--]

Alongside it, &eComplementary Reimagined&r has been included. To enable it, simply take a visit to your &6graphics settings&r and turn it on![--同时,&eComplementary Reimagined&r也在光影列表里.想要启用只需进入&6视频设置&r打开!--]
Throwing Shade[--投影--]
The akashic tome contains most of the books that various mods will use in the pack.[--阿卡什宝典包含着大多数模组的指南书。--]

Sneak and right-clicking will let you browse and select anybook contained within. To add more books, simply combine the tome with any other book in a crafting grid.[--潜行右键可以选择里面的书。要添加更多的书,只需将宝典放在合成页面与其他书合成。--]
Join or Create a team Island[--加入或创建一个团队小岛--]
Craft some of the chunks you dug up into gravel to make flint.[--用你挖到的沙砾做一些燧石。--]
This can be done by looking up how to make flint in JEI.[--在JEI中寻找合成燧石的方法。--]
The flint hatchet wont last long, but it should be enough to get you started chopping down some trees to make better tools. [--头斧不会长,但应该足够你用来砍树制作更好的工具了。--]

You know the drill; break trees, make things. Make a crafting table to get started delving into the recipes ahead. For your convenience we've added it to a stick! Enjoy. Also check out the &ecrafting station&r which can use adjacent inventories and retain items. [--挖掘;撸树,合成物品。做个工作台开始研究前面的配方。为了给你提供方便,我们把它粘到了棒棒上!也看看&e合成站&r,它可以同时查看相邻的容器并且物品会在合成界面上保留.--]

The mixing cauldron takes exactly 8 input items and a liquid and produces a new item. It will also convert any &bremaining liquid&r into a new liquid type.[--混合锅需要8个输入物品和1个液体来生产新的物品。它还会将&b剩余液体&r转化为新的液体类型.--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

This means that a recipe, that requires &b&l1000mb of liquid to craft&r and has &6&l1000mb of liquid as output&r, needs to have atleast 2000mb of liquid inside, before you input the items[--这意味着,一个配方,需要&b&l1000mb的液体来制作&r,并且有&6&l1000mb的液体作为输出&r,里面至少要装2000mb液体--]

&bBiomass&r is needed to get into producing peat for the material generator. This will be your first form of FE production and peat will remain useful throughout the game later for methane byproducts. [--&b生物质&r是制作材料制造器所需的泥炭。这是你第一种FE生产方式,以后在游戏过程中对甲烷副产物仍然有用。--]

The create &bmixer&r can combine many different varieties of fluids and items to combine them into something new. Your first uses will be for biomass and Primitive Slurry but you'll find many more uses for it. It's not a bad idea to make a couple of these.[--&b动力搅拌机&r可以将许多不同的流体和物品组合成新的东西。你的第一种用途是用来做生物质和基浆,但你会找到更多的用途。做两个搅拌机是个好主意。--]

When making Primitive Slurry, make sure the Blaze Burner is lit &bbefore&r putting the Gravel in, or it will just make flint instead of Primitive Slurry.[--在制作基浆时,注意确保&b放沙砾之前&r烈焰人燃烧室燃烧,要不然会做出一堆燧石来.--]
An Iron Dish[--铁板--]
You got a lot on your plate, huh?[--铁板板，躺板板--]

&bIron plates&r are formed with iron substrate or - later - ingots, which is suitable enough to make actual machinery. You'll need quite a few of these![--&b铁板&r由铁基片或之后做出的铁锭制成,足以制作真正的机器.你需要这些大量的铁板!--]

One of your first machines, the &bCreate mechanical press&r will allow you to press out materials in order to fortify them into better components. &6Check out the ponder for how it works by holding w on it&r. [--你的第一个机器,&b动力辊压机&r允许你压扁材料获得更好的组件.&6指着它&r查看思索如何工作.--]
Not the fastest...[--不是最快的...--]

Make &bpeat&r from dry peat which you then saturate in world by placing it in water. Once it converts to saturated you mine it up and smelt it. This smelted peat can be burned for fuel but once you're able to further refine it into enriched peat you'll want to do that for far better energy yield. It is suggested you make at least a stack of this at a time as you'll need quite a bit to get to the end of this chapter. [--把干燥泥炭田放入水中获得&b饱和泥炭田&r。等到它饱和时,你就可以扔进炉子里烧炼。这个烧出的泥炭可以作为燃料燃烧,但你能进一步将其精炼成富集泥炭,获得更好的能量产出。建议你一次至少做一组,因为你需要用一些个泥炭才能完成这个章节。--]
Sweet Dreams are made of Seeds[--甜梦由种子萌生--]

You can sift to get some demon dream seeds. Plant them and they'll grow into demon dream fruits. You can eat them to gain a sight beyond sight, useful for dabbling in the occult. You can also light them on fire to produce an unending ghostly flame that converts items thrown into it with the power of the occult.[--你可以筛一些魔鬼之梦种子。种植它们,它们会变成魔鬼之梦果。吃掉它们可以获得第三只眼,对于在神秘学初期很有用。你也可以点燃它们产生不灭的灵火,用神秘学的力量转化将扔进它的物品。--]

&bSoul engulfing&r is performed by lighting soul sand on fire and throwing items into it to convert them, similar to &eOccultism's&r spirit fire. Pay attention to the multiblock shown in the recipe as this is required to allow the items to be properly engullfed. Throwing items into an incorrect structure will result in them burning! [--&b灵魂吞噬&r是在灵魂沙上打火将物品扔进去转化它们,类似于&e神秘学&r的灵火。注意配方中显示的多方块结构,这是物品转化所必须的。将物品扔入不正确的结构会把它们烧掉!--]

To get started, throw some glowstone in the fire to convert it to soul powder. If you're having trouble finding glowstone, checkout the endless witch gateway pearl. [--一开始,在火里扔一些荧石来将其转化为灵魂粉。如果你找不到荧石,请查看无尽女巫之门珍珠。--]

Place the blood sigil inside the Hexerei cauldron. Once its inside you can jump up and down on it to cause the cauldron to begin to fill with blood. You'll then be able to use the blood for further crafting recipes. Make sure to remove the sigil when you're not using it anymore.[--将嗜血符文放入釜中。放入炼药锅中后,在上面跳上跳下,让炼药锅慢慢填满血液。然后你就可以使用血来进一步制作配方。当不使用它时,确保移除符文。--]

You only need 1 bucket of liquid biomass to make the blood sigil. If you put more than 1 bucket of liquid biomass in, the rest will get converted to the new liquid. For example, if you put in 3000mb of biomass to craft the sigil you will get 2000mb of cognitium along with the sigil when it completes.[--你只需要1桶生物质制作嗜血符文。如果你放入1桶以上的生物质,其他的将转化为新的液体。例如,如果你放入3000mb的生物质来制作这个符文,你将在它完成的时候得到2000mb的感知和符文。--]
Power Peat[--泥炭能量--]
The material generator consumes peat or enriched peat and produces forge energy (FE). It ain't much, but it's an honest day's work.[--物质发电机消耗泥炭或富集泥炭,并生产能量(FE)。这并不多,但它是你一天的劳动成果。--]
It's \"SUPER!\"[--非常\"超级!\"--]

The &b\"Super\" Cooler&r will take a liquid input and up to 3 items and produce a new item at the cost of FE. These can be a bit tricky to automate so make sure to check your input and output filtering. [--&b“超级”冷却器&r有一个液体输入和最多3个物品位,并消耗FE生成一个新物品。这些东西自动化可能有点难,所以确保检查一下你输入和输出的过滤。--]

The &bMana Pool&r can store mana directed at it with a mana spreader or pulled from with a mana spreader next to it. You'll need one to start storing mana and performing mana infusions.[--&b魔力池&r可以用魔力发射器来储存或提取魔力。你需要存储魔力以进行魔力灌注.--]

Your earliest source of redstone is from killing witches. The endless witch gate can be crafted with some simple mob drops and will cause witches to spawn indefinitely until you fail the wave timer at which point the pearl will return to you to use again when you need it.[--你最大的红石来源是杀女巫。女巫传送门可以用一些简单的生物掉落物制作,巫师会无限生成,直到你失败时，珍珠会返还给你，你需要时可以继续使用。--]
Make some &bCrystalize&r to begin crafting magical machines.[--做一些&b琥珀结晶&r来开始制作魔法机器.--]
Need a good way to store your EXP?[--想要把你的经验都存起来吗?--]
Don't worry, the &bExperience Obelisk&r is just the block for you[--不要担心,这个&b经验方尖碑&r只有你能用--]
In its internal storage, it can store up to &aMAXINT&r (&a2,147,483,647&r) EXP[--它可以最多存储&a最大整数值&r (&a2,147,483,647&r) EXP--]
The &bExperience Obelisk&r can &6store experience&r, absorb nearby xp orbs, and &6give and take it from the player&r.[--&b经验方尖碑&r可以&6储存经验&r,吸收附近的经验球,&6存入和取出玩家身上的经验&r.--]

The &bImbuement Chamber&r will unlock the path towards catalyzing metals from raw materials. You will need to obtain various mob drops and imbue them with &dSource&r to convert them to something more beneficial. &dSource&r will generate on its own over time in the chamber but later you can accelerate it with a vitalic sourcelink.[--&b灌注室&r会解锁把原料变成催化金属的途径。你需要获得各种生物掉落物,并给它们灌注&d魔源&r来将其转化为更有用的东西。&d魔源&r会随着时间的推移在里面自动生成,但之后你可以用生死魔源通道加速它。--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

We have provided you with a &6Schematiccannon&r and a &6Prefab-Barrel&r with all the neccessary items to automaticly build a functional mobfarm to use. After all, you've built enough mob farms before now, havent you?[--我们已经为您提供了&6蓝图加农炮&r和一个&6准备好的桶&r,提供了所有必要的物品来自动建造一个功能性怪物农场。毕竟,你之前已经建造了足够多的怪物农场了,不是吗?--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]
Use the &6Schematic Table&r with the &6Schematic and Quill&r and copy over the mobfarm.nbt on it.[--使用&6蓝图桌&r和&6蓝图与笔&r并复制mobfarm.nbt.--]

Use the newly written &6Schematic and Quill&r to place a blueprint of said Mobfarm and insert it into the &6Schematicannon&r. Place the Barrel next to it and add some Gunpowder and let it fire away![--使用新写入的&6蓝图与笔&r放置怪物农场的蓝图并将其插入&6蓝图加农炮&r。把桶放在它旁边,放入一些火药并让它开火!--]
Archwood Sapling[--至高木树苗--]

Archwood is a magical wood that is suitable for most of the Ars magic contraptions. You can craft it in the solidification chamber and recolor it with the crafting recipes. The color is a preference only; they all produce the same wood for your recipes.[--至高木是一种适合大多数Ars魔法装置的魔法木。你可以在结晶器中制作,然后用配方重新配色。颜色只是一种偏好;它们在配方上是等价的。--]
Catalyst for Production[--用于生产的催化剂--]

&bMetal catalysts&r are your first way of producing actual ingots of the various metals in a reliable method. It uses magic for now and can be labor-intensive, so it's worth crafting in bulk. You'll soon get into easier methods of production, but you'll need a few of the ingots to get you there.[--&b金属催化剂&r是你在一种可靠的方法下实际生产各种金属锭的第一种方式。它现在使用魔法,并且可以是劳动密度的,所以值得大量制作。你将很快进入更简单的生产方法,但你需要一些锭才能让你到达那里。--]

&bIron substrate&r is a form of rudimentary iron plate. It's not durable enough to use in anything but the most primitive machines but it'll do for now.[--&b铁基板&r是基础铁板的一种形式。它不够耐用,除了最原始的机器外,但它现在派上用场了.--]

&bWhiterock&r is needed to get into &eElementalcraft&r and other magics. You'll need to create a few in the enchanting apparatus, but once you have enough to make your petal apothecary, you'll find a much easier method using the Pure Daisy.[--&b白石&r是入门&e元素工艺&r和其他魔法所需的。你需要在附魔装置里做一些,但当你做出花药台了,用白雏菊会更简单一些。--]
Elemental Essences[--元素精华--]

&bElemental Essences&r are the driving magic force behind most Source-infused magics. You'll need an abundant supply of these, especially the air variety, so crafting in bulk is highly suggested.[--&b元素精华&r是大多数魔源灌注法术的驱动力。你需要大量的这种力量,特别是气之精华,所以建议做多一点.--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]
Fun Fact for Water Shards:[--水元素碎片的有趣事实:--]
&6Place a raw fish inside a dispenser and dispense it. It will summon a live Fish for you to re-kill and farm Water shards.&r[--&6将一条生鱼放在发射器里发射它。可以召唤一条活鱼，重复击杀可以获得水元素碎片.&r--]

The &bCoke Oven&r turns coal into coked coal which is suitable for creating steel or burning as longer lasting fuel. You can accelerate this process by using a pyrolyzer later once you have produced some steel and circuits. [--&b焦炉&r将煤炭变成焦煤,适合制作钢或作为长时间的燃料。做出一些钢和电路后,你就可以用热解炉加速这一过程.--]
The &bBlast Furnace&r will cook iron ingots and coked coal into steel.[--&b高炉&r会把铁锭和焦煤变成钢.--]

Harder metals enable higher-tier machines and manufacturing methods. You'll use a considerable amount of &bsteel&r. Make sure your production is automated and up to the task. You'll move into faster production methods later, but you'll want to cook up at least a stack for now.[--强度更高的金属意味着更高等级的机器和制造方法。你将需要使用大量的&b钢&r。确保你的生产自动化,直到任务完成。你稍后会获得更快的制作方法,但你现在至少要做一组.--]
Converts slowly in the imbuement chamber over time. Providing &bSource&r will greatly speed up this process but it is optional.[--随着时间的推移,灌注室自己会缓慢转换.提供&b魔源&r会极大地加速这个过程,但不是必须需要.--]

Now that you have &bSource&r gems and gold, you can combine a Source gem with 8 stones around it to create a Source stone. This magically imbued stone will act as a basis for many of the &eArs&r machinery. Use it to make an &bEnchantment Apparatus&r to refine material catalysts further.[--现在你有了&b魔源&r宝石和金,你可以将魔源宝石和周围的8个石块组合在一起来制造奥术石。这种魔法灌注的石头将成为许多&e魔源&r机器的基础。使用它制作一个&b附魔装置&r来进一步提炼材料催化剂.--]

The &bPetal Apothecary&r is a basic crafting fountain for many botanical magic flowers. &6Don't forget you can duplicate petals by planting them and then bone mealing to grow tall variants.&r[--&b花药台&r是许多植物魔法花的基本合成水池。&6不要忘记,你可以种植花瓣,然后用骨粉来催熟各种类型&r--]

Now that you have a Petal Apothecary, you're ready to make a &bPure Daisy&r. With the Pure Daisy, you can convert materials into magical materials for use in &eBotania&r and &eElementalcraft&r. [--现在你有了花药台,已经准备好制作一个&b白雏菊&r了。有了白雏菊,你可以将材料转化为魔法材料,用于&e植物魔法&r和&e元素工艺&r.--]

The &bDiesel Generator&r will burn diesel based fuels, and produces stress units (SU). It consumes fuel constantly while in operation at the rate of about 2mb per second, or a bit over 8 minutes per bucket. You can toggle these off with a redstone signal. [--&b柴油发电机&r会燃烧柴油,并产生应力单元(SU)。在运行时,它会持续消耗燃料,每秒约2mb,或每桶略超过8分钟。你可以用红石信号来关停。--]
Plant Oil[--植物油--]

Your first liquid fuel, &bVegetable&r! You can start processing seeds with &eCreate&r pressing but once you can generate air pressure you can double your yield by processing the seeds with &ePnuematicraft&r.[--你的第一个液体燃料,&b植物油&r!你有了&e机械动力&r后就可以开始处理种子,但当你能产生气压时,你可以使用&e气动工艺&r处理种子翻倍产量.--]
Vegetable oil is too raw a fluid for the diesel generator but blaze burners will happily accept it to become heated in place of coal. [--植物油对柴油发电机来说不合胃口,但烈焰人会乐于接受它来代替煤来加热.--]
Ethanol[--乙醇--]

&bEthanol&r is a precursor fuel which you will use to further refine burnable biodiesel. It can also be broken down for several other important chemical processes.[--&b乙醇&r是一种前置燃料,你将使用它来进一步精炼可燃生物柴油。它也可以分解成其他几个重要的化学品.--]

Turn to your mob farm for spider eyes to get some batches of this made early, once you graduate to &ePneumaticraft&r you can skip those and process ethanol directly.[--前往你的怪物农场,获得蜘蛛眼作为早期材料,一旦你进入&e气动工艺&r,你可以直接跳过这些处理乙醇.--]
Biodiesel[--生物柴油--]

Your first real fuel! &bBiodiesel&r can power the Diesel generators and many other fuel burners including blaze burners. As with similar steps, you can begin processing this with &eCreate&r but you'll find an easier route once you're into &ePneumaticraft&r.[--第一个真正的燃料!&b柴油&r可以给柴油发电机和许多其他燃料燃烧室(包括烈焰燃烧室)供能。和类似步骤一样,你开始可以用&e机械动力&r来处理,但当你进入&e气动工艺&r时你会找到一个更简单的路线.--]
The &bpeat farmer&r will help automate the placement and production of dry peat in water. [--&b泥炭农场&r将自动水中泥炭的放置和生产.--]

Your first method of generating &bSource&r for your &eArs Magica&r. The &bVitalic Sourcelink&r will capture the souls of nearby mobs that die and transfer them into a nearby source jar.[--你在&eArs魔法&r里生产&b魔源&r的第一种方法。&b生死魔源通道&r将捕捉周围死亡生物的灵魂并将他们传输到附近的魔源罐中.--]
Beggars can't be Pikmins[--乞丐不能是皮克敏--]

Peat can be further enriched to provide twice as much energy. You'll also need this to summon a blaze. Its worth making quite a bit of this early on to carry you into other power methods. You could also go all in and come up with a fully automated self sustain system, you do you![--泥炭可以进一步富集,提供2倍的能量。你还需要它来召唤烈焰人。它早期就值得做,带你转移到其他的产能方法中。你也可以全身投入搭建一个完全自动化的自给系统,你需要它!--]
Elemental Crystals[--元素水晶--]
Shardless Behavior[--无尽行为--]

&bElementalCraft&r element crystals can be tossed (Right-Click) and have a chance to be broken into their respective &6Elemental Shards&r or &6Powerful Shards&r[--&b元素工艺&r的元素水晶可以被扔出去(右键)并有几率破坏成它们自己的&6元素碎片&r或&6高能碎片&r--]
One Crystal take 1000units of element. Shard gives 250units and Powerful Shards gives 2500units.[--一个水晶需要1000个单位元素。碎片提供250个单位,高能碎片提供2500个单位。--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

Different types of enemies will drop different shard types depending on the type of creature. You also get a chance for powerful shards to drop if they are killed directly by a player. [--不同种类的敌人会根据生物的类型掉落不同的碎片类型。如果它们被玩家直接杀死,也有几率掉落高能碎片。--]

Water shards, for example, can be obtained by fishing for fish and then putting them into a dispenser which will cause them to become fish entities that will drop water shards. [--例如,可以通过钓鱼来获得鱼,然后将其放入一个发射器,使它们变成掉落水元素碎片的鱼实体。--]

The Elemental Infuser takes an item and infuses it with the elemental energy piped into it from the container under it. You can pipe from other containers into the one at the bottom if your recipe calls for more than a single container can hold.[--元素灌注器上放置物品并注入下面元素容器里的元素能量。如果你的配方元素需求超过一个容器,你可以从其他容器中用管道抽到底部的容器中。--]

HINT: &6If you're struggling for water shards, the cyclic fisher can catch fish you can eject from a dispenser to turn back into fish mobs. Once you kill them, they have a chance to drop water shards.&r[--提示:&6如果你在为水元素碎片而苦苦烦恼,循环的钓鱼机可以捉鱼，从发射器中弹出来变成鱼实体。杀死他们后,有几率掉落水元素碎片.&r--]
Ironing out production[--解锁产能--]

Now that you've finished the basic infrastructure to catalyze metals into ingot form you can begin to open up more sutainable, automatable and higher technology production lines. Remeber to continue crafting in bulk where possible, it will pay off in time savings.[--现在你已经完成将金属催化成锭的基本结构了,可以开始打开更多的可持续、可自动化和更高技术的生产线了。记住在可能的情况下继续批量制作,它将节省大量时间。--]

Venture into the depths of the Nether and test your skills in negotiation with the enigmatic &6Piglin&r tribes to acquire a rare and coveted &bAmethyst Shard&r.[--冒险进入下界深处,在与神秘&6猪灵&r的部落商贩中测试你的技能,以获得一个稀有垂涎的&b紫水晶碎片&r.--]
Cobble for Days[--Cobble for Days--]

Now that you have access to water and lava you can create a cobble generator from cobble for days to automatically create cobble for you which can feed into autohammers for resource production.[--现在你可以使用水和熔岩了,你可以用cobble for days做一个圆石制造机,为你自动制造圆石,可以将圆石输入自动锤来生产资源。--]
An Iron Dish[--铁板--]
You got a lot on your plate, huh?[--铁板板，躺板板--]
Iron plates are formed iron substrate, or later, ingots, which is suitable enough to make actual machinery. You'll need quite a few of these![--铁板是铁基板或以后的铁锭做出来的,这足以制造真正的机器。你需要大量的铁板!--]
All that glitters...[--所有那些闪闪发光的东西...--]
We're Rich![--我们很富有!--]

The process of creating &bgold&r is the same as most ingots, you'll create a catalyst and combine it with primitive slurry. Unfortunately, you need gold to make the enchanting aparatus and imbuement chamber to create the catalysts. [--制作&b金锭&r与大多数锭相同,你将制造一个催化剂并将其与基浆结合。不幸的是,你需要金锭来制作附魔装置和灌注室才能做催化剂。--]

To get your first few pieces of gold you'll combine redstone with primitive slurry in the solidification chamber to make gold shards and then mix those to make gold ingots similar to how you made your first copper. [--为了得到你的前几块金子,你将在结晶器中将红石和基浆结合,制作金碎片,然后将它们混合成金锭，就像你怎么你制作的第一块铜。--]
The &bElemental container&r contains-you guessed it- elements. It will store elemental essences for later use. [--&b元素容器&r包含你推测的元素。它可以存储元素精华供以后使用.--]
In FTB Skies Expert we have a bunch of Events happening that occur during your gameplay.[--在FTB Skies Expert中,我们有一堆事件在你游玩过程中发生。--]
This Quest will let you toggle them individually.[--这个任务可以让你自己单独切换.--]
Check the next Page for all the Toggles[--查看下一页的所有切换--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

Diamond Blocks can convert into Budding Amethyst with this Event.\"]}}]

Spawns a random Quantum Goat near you!\"]}}][--[\"\",\"山羊                             \",{\"text\":\"[ 开关 ]\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"gold\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/events toggle ftbskies:goat\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"开关山羊事件. 在你身边生成一只随机量子山羊!\"]}}]--]
FTB Events[--FTB事件--]
The &bKiln brick&r is used to make a kiln. Put 8 kiln bricks together and smack them with a hammer. Boom. Kiln. Now you can make alloys.[--&b窑砖&r用于制作合金窑。把8个窑砖放在一起用锤子右键它们。当当，一个窑。现在你可以制作合金了。--]
The &bInvar Ingot&r is made in the kiln. It's an alloy of nickel and iron. [--&b殷钢锭&r由窑炉制作。它是镍和铁的合金.--]
Amber waves of grain[--金色的麦浪--]

Now that you have grass you can bone meal it to make tall grass which you can break to get seed drops. Break some grass until you get seeds and then grow some &bwheat&r for food, and crafting later.[--现在你有草了,你可以用骨头催熟成高草,你可以破坏它来得到种子掉落物。破坏一些草,直到你得到种子,然后种植一些&b小麦&r来获取食物,然后再合成.--]
WINNER WINNER CHICKEN DINNER[--赢家，赢家，鸡肉晚餐--]

Now that you have the wheat, craft up a &bchickenpalooza pearl&r. This will rain chickens down on you for food and soul harvesting (to use later in summoning other creatures).[--现在你有小麦了,制作一个&b坤坤传送门珍珠&r。你身上会落下小鸡以获得食物和灵魂收割(稍后用于召唤其他生物)。--]
Compacted Cobblestone, Dirt, and Gravel[--压缩圆石、泥土和砂砾--]

You can make a compacted variant of dirt, cobblestone, and gravel, that will give full blocks instead of rocks and clumps of soil by throwing 9 cobblestone or 9 dirt into a basin, and using a mechanical press to press them together.[--你可以做一个压缩版本,包括泥土、圆石和砂砾,将9个圆石或9个泥土扔进盆中并使用机械冲压将其压缩成1个方块。--]
Schematic Cannons[--蓝图加农炮--]
Most of the mutliblocks in this pack have been provided to you as schematics. You can use the Schematic Cannon to place them automatically.[--这个包中大多数多方块都是提供了蓝图。您可以使用蓝图加农炮自动放置它们。--]
